original_text: Notwithstanding they hearkened not unto Moses; but some of them left of it until the morning, and it bred worms, and stank: and Moses was wroth with them.
korean_text: 그들이 모세에게 순종하지 아니하고 더러는 아침까지 두었더니 벌레가 생기고 냄새가 난지라 모세가 그들에게 노하니라

sentences.original_text: Notwithstanding they hearkened not unto Moses;
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 그들은 모세의 말을 듣지 않았고

sentences.original_text: but some of them left of it until the morning,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 어떤 이들은 그것을 아침까지 남겨 두었고

sentences.original_text: and it bred worms, and stank:
and Moses was wroth with them.
